title: Ep. 50: Helena Glazer co-hosts the Daisy Jones & the Six Book Club!
itunes:title: Ep. 50: Helena Glazer co-hosts the Daisy Jones & the Six Book Club!
description:
In this episode, we have one of our favorite bookworms and bloggers, Helena Glazer, joining us for the Daisy Jones & the Six book club! We highly value Helena’s book opinion, so we knew she had to be a pod guest. You guys raved about this book, so we’re excited to talk with Helena about it!

Also in this episode, Becca is obsessed with the Sleep Cycle app, and Grace loves following body-positive influencer, @CaralynMirand.

Because Helena is amazing and we had so many questions for her, we are releasing a BONUS episode next Monday where we will talk all things books, fashion, and skincare. You can follow Helena here and find her blog here!

Sponsors:

  • Small Packages: For 15% off your purchase of $50 or more,  go to smallpackages.coand enter code BAD at checkout.
  • Care/of: For 50% off your first month of personalized vitamins, go to takecareof.comand enter code BOP50 at checkout.

Books Mentioned

Daisy Jones & The Six

Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo

Rules of Civility

The Perfect Girlfriend

More Than Words

The Light We Lost
